bibl.title: Literacy and Epigraphy. I.
bibl.note: This article attempts to find out whether inscriptions can tell us anything clear or important about literacy in the Roman world. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Cemeteries of Corycus and Tyre. - 3. Greek Elementary Schools under the Principate. - 4. Who Read and Wrote the Graffiti at Pompeii?
bibl.seg: Harris William V., Literacy and Epigraphy. I.

This article attempts to find out whether inscriptions can tell us anything clear or important about literacy in the Roman world. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Cemeteries of Corycus and Tyre. - 3. Greek Elementary Schools under the Principate. - 4. Who Read and Wrote the Graffiti at Pompeii?
